page.title: 01Sandhills area in general
page.content: Our area is mainly crops and grass.We have a lot of farms including a pick your own farm.There are two villages and there is also a big residential area including Sandhills,Risinghurst and Barton.In the residential areas there are some small general shops, postoffice shops,two churches, recreation parks,pubs,community centres,an old peoples home,a play group, one primary school and one special school for handicapped children.Some of the buildings are very old like Bayswater Mill which is being converted into a house.We have two main woods Holton wood and Stanton great wood. Along the bottom of our area is the A40.
